page.title: 08ST.JAMES STREET STATION.
page.content: Walthamstow is a good location for travel facilities. There are various ways of getting to places by using trains,buses and taxis. St.James Street Station is at the beginning of the High Street but it is not the only one in our area. The busiest time in the station is on a Monday morning when up to a thousand people pass through to use the trains. There are five people working as ticket collectors etc.They always try to keep the trains on time. People at the station are friendly and will help you if you need it.The Ticket Collector is very polite and helpful.He works almost 8 hours a day and 39 hours a week. He said his job is very interesting because it involved meeting and talking to other people.
